attributes.action: Create a EU force to remove Robert Mugabe from office...by force if necessary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He has devastated what was once the breadbasket of Africa, with millions starving, no infrastructure, and now cholera to contend with. He is a despot in the same league as Idi Amin and should be removed by force if needed. The British Government installed him as leader in 1980 after the Air Rhodesia fiasco (plane shot down and passengers murdered) and has a moral duty to the people of Zimbabwe.
